titleStmt.title: letter from The Hogarth Press Ltd. to Friedich Michael, 12 October 1951: a machine readable transcription

bibl.title: Letter from The Hogarth Press to Friedich Michael, 12 October 1951

body:
AB
12th October, 1951
Friedich Michael Insel-Verlag Karlstrasse 38 Weisbaden
Dear Dr.Doctor Michael,
We have been asked by Dr.Doctor L.L.
Weltmann to let you have a copy of
SADO by William Plomer and I have
pleasure in enclosing a copy. Dr.Doctor
Weltmann thinks that you would like
to consider this book with a view to
a German translation and that you might
probably be interested in Mr.Mister Plomer's
work as a whole. We very much hope
that you will be impressed by SADO
and shall look forward to hearing
from you about it in due course.
Yours sincerely, for The Hogarth Press Ltd.limited .
DCBDonald C. Brace:CMc.
